data.title: Mena Suvari Divorce: Ex Requests $17,000 A Month In Spousal Support
data.meta_description: Mena Suvari's Ex Makes Outrageous Request
data.text:
Elsewhere in the docs, Sestito -- a concert promoter -- reportedly alleges that "American Reunion" actress makes $750,000 a year and says he's used to eating out "almost everyday at high end restaurants," listing his estimated monthly dining expenses at $3,000 a month.

The "American Beauty" actress' first marriage to Robert Brinkmann, a cinematographer 17 years her senior, ended in 2005 after five years of marriage. In an interview with the Daily Mail last month, Suvari opened up about her two failed marriages: "Honestly, I never thought that at 33 I’d be a two-time divorcee. But OK, if that’s the path my life is going down, then I accept it."
